sect1.title: Limited Beta - Details of the beta release
sect1.para: Release Date 15th September 2010 zpool version 18 solaris build b121 linux distros supported (64-bit only) Fedora12 (rpms) RHEL 6 beta 2 (rpms) Ubuntu 10.04 (deb)

sect1.title: GA Details - Details of the beta release
sect1.para: Release Date 15th December 2010 zpool version 26 solaris build onnv_141 linux distros supported (64-bit only) Fedora11/Fedora12 (rpms) RHEL5/RHEL6 (rpms) SuSE11 Ubuntu 10.04 (deb) others (if we see sufficient interest)
